@template access

{{html:
<div class="account-container stacked" ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="SessionController">
    <div class="content clearfix padding">
    <div class="login-symbol">
        <form ng-submit="login()">
            <h1>Sign In</h1>

            <div class="login-fields">

                
                <div class="alert alert-error ng-hide" ng-show="login_error">Please enter the correct username & password.</div>
                <div class="field">
                    <div class="loginField">
                        <label class="loginFieldName">Username:</label>
                        <div class="inputWrap" style="width: 75%;">
                            <input type="text"  class="inputLogin" id="username" name="username" value=""  ng-model="user.username" autofill="autofill"/>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="field">
                    <div class="loginField">
                        <label class="loginFieldName" for="password">Password:</label>
                        <div class="inputWrap" style="width: 75%;">
                            <input class="inputLogin" type="password" id="password_field" name="" value=""  ng-model="user.password" autofill="autofill"/>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                 </div>
                
            </div>

            
                <input type="submit" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block primaryMine" value="Login" >
            
			<div class="sp"></div> 
			<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-default btn-lg btn-block defaultMine">Sign Up</a>
            
        </form>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
}}
